articles.description: Foreign funds' ownership in domestic equities fell to pre-Covid lows and hit a multi-year low of 19.5 per cent in March this year in NSE500 companies valued at USD 619 billion, shows an analysis
articles.content:
Foreign funds' ownership in domestic equities fell to pre-COVID lows and hit a multi-year low of 19.5 per cent in March this year in NSE500 companies valued at USD 619 billion, shows an analysis.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Future Enterprises to raise Rs 3,000 crore from insurance biz sale; aims to pare debt, avoid insolvency - Economic Times
articles.description: On March 31, FEL defaulted on repayment of Rs 2,911.51 crore of loans to the consortium of banks and lenders. Later it also missed a 30-day review period as per the scheme of One Time Restructuring (OTR) for COVID-hit companies with its consortium of banks.
articles.content: Debt-ridden Future Group firm Future Enterprises Ltd expects to raise around Rs 3,000 crore from selling its stake in the insurance business to pare debt, which may save the company from facing the r… [+3408 chars]

articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: Saudi prince replies after Elon Musk asks how much does Kingdom own in Twitter - Times Now
articles.description: Saudi Prince Alwaleed bin Talal Al-Saud initially rejected Elon Musk's offer of $54.20 per share to buy Twitter. The Saudi Prince who is an investor in Twitter had said the offer came nowhere close to the intrinsic value of the company
